mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT CODE_BIGO AS CODE_NM, GRP_GB AS CODE_ID FROM SGCOCDMA00TT WHERE 1=1 AND CODE_BIGO LIKE '%'||#{CODE_BIGO}||'%' ORDER BY GRP_GB

SELECT GRP_GB, CODE_ID, CODE_NM, USER1, USER2, USER3, USER4, USER5, USER1_BIGO, USER2_BIGO, USER3_BIGO, USER4_BIGO, USER5_BIGO, CODE_BIGO, PRINT_SEQ, USE_YN, UPDATE_DT, UPDATE_MAN, INSERT_MAN FROM SGCOCDMA00TT WHERE 1=1 AND GRP_GB = #{GRP_GB} ORDER BY CODE_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SGCOCDMA00TT(GRP_GB, CODE_ID, CODE_NM, USER1, USER2, USER3, USER4, USER5, USER1_BIGO, USER2_BIGO, USER3_BIGO, USER4_BIGO, USER5_BIGO, CODE_BIGO, PRINT_SEQ, USE_YN, UPDATE_DT, UPDATE_MAN, INSERT_MAN) VALUES(#{GRP_GB}, #{CODE_ID}, #{CODE_NM}, #{USER1}, #{USER2}, #{USER3}, #{USER4}, #{USER5}, #{USER1_BIGO}, #{USER2_BIGO}, #{USER3_BIGO}, #{USER4_BIGO}, #{USER5_BIGO}, #{CODE_BIGO}, #{PRINT_SEQ}, #{USE_YN}, SYSDATE, #{UPDATE_MAN}, #{INSERT_MAN})

UPDATE SGCOCDMA00TT SET GRP_GB = #{GRP_GB}, CODE_ID = #{CODE_ID}, CODE_NM = #{CODE_NM}, USER1 = #{USER1}, USER2 = #{USER2}, USER3 = #{USER3}, USER4 = #{USER4}, USER5 = #{USER5}, USER1_BIGO = #{USER1_BIGO}, USER2_BIGO = #{USER2_BIGO}, USER3_BIGO = #{USER3_BIGO}, USER4_BIGO = #{USER4_BIGO}, USER5_BIGO = #{USER5_BIGO}, CODE_BIGO = #{CODE_BIGO}, PRINT_SEQ = #{PRINT_SEQ}, USE_YN = #{USE_YN}, UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE, UPDATE_MAN = #{UPDATE_MAN} WHERE GRP_GB = #{DataSetSavedData.GRP_GB} AND CODE_ID = #{DataSetSavedData.CODE_ID}
